name: World of Tanks XVM Configuration File
summary: Learn about .XVMCONF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Previously, you could edit XVMCONF files with a visual editor called XVM editor. However, the editor is now deprecated.
NOTE: XVMCONF files use the filename XVM.xvmconf.

description: An XVM file is a text configuration file used by XVM (eXtended Visualization Mod), a mod for the tank fighting game World of Tanks (WoT). It configures additional features such as vehicle markers, player or clan icons, vehicle icon sets, and in-game player ratings.
